title: [Path to Enlightenment]
description: You come upon a silent oak tree, resilient and strong, patiently extending its reach towards the sun.  Scattered about the ground, a blanket of acorns and twigs adds an ungraceful crunch to your step.

You come upon a silent oak tree, resilient and strong, patiently extending its reach towards the stars.  Scattered about the ground, a blanket of acorns and twigs adds an ungraceful crunch to your step.
